title: How to Upload Photos to Photovine

steps.headline: Download Photovine on your iPhone from the App Store, if you haven’t already.
Tap the Photovine icon from your iPhone’s home screen to launch the app.
Sign up if you haven’t already.
Tap the green “+” sign button bottom center of your screen.
Tap the camera icon to snap a photo.
steps.description: You can also tap the icon in the upper right corner to switch between the main and front-facing cameras. Alternatively, you can click the icon in the bottom right corner to select an image from your camera roll.

steps.headline: Enter a “vine” for your image.
steps.description: A vine is essentially a category that will allow others to add images based on that same category. Alternatively, you can select one of the currently existing vines that will appear as you begin to type.

steps.headline: Click the green “Confirm” button in the bottom right corner.
Optionally enter a description of the image in the “What’s the story…?” input field.
steps.description: You can also optionally tap the “Select friends” tab to share the image with friends from your Contacts or those you are following.

steps.headline: Tap the toggle switch next to “Facebook” or “Twitter” under “Sharing” in order to share the image on those services.
steps.description: Note: You will be prompted to sign in to your Facebook or Twitter account.

steps.headline: Tap the “Post” button in the upper right corner to upload the image to Photovine.

text: Download Photovine on your iPhone from the App Store, if you haven’t already.  Tap the Photovine icon from your iPhone’s home screen to launch the app.  Sign up if you haven’t already.  Tap the green “+” sign button bottom center of your screen.  Tap the camera icon to snap a photo. You can also tap the icon in the upper right corner to switch between the main and front-facing cameras. Alternatively, you can click the icon in the bottom right corner to select an image from your camera roll. Enter a “vine” for your image. A vine is essentially a category that will allow others to add images based on that same category. Alternatively, you can select one of the currently existing vines that will appear as you begin to type. Click the green “Confirm” button in the bottom right corner.  Optionally enter a description of the image in the “What’s the story…?” input field. You can also optionally tap the “Select friends” tab to share the image with friends from your Contacts or those you are following. Tap the toggle switch next to “Facebook” or “Twitter” under “Sharing” in order to share the image on those services. Note: You will be prompted to sign in to your Facebook or Twitter account. Tap the “Post” button in the upper right corner to upload the image to Photovine.
